text: Q1.	  	  (Non-­‐assessed)	  The figure below shows a snapshot at time t0 of a wave traveling in the positive x direction along a string under tension. (a) Copy this graph, and on the same graph overlay a snapshot of the wave at t0 +T/8, where T is the period. (b) Determine at time t0, for each of the four highlighted points, whether the point is moving up or down. 	  ! 	   	   	   	   1 2 3 4
